root.name: dist()

example.code: v1 = PVector(10, 20, 0) v2 = PVector(60, 80, 0) d = v1.dist(v2) println(d) # Prints "78.10249328613281"
v1 = PVector(10, 20, 0) v2 = PVector(60, 80, 0) d = PVector.dist(v1, v2) println(d) # Prints "78.10249328613281"

root.description: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points (considering a point as a vector object).
